thread.title: Michael Holley: The Browns Should Give Up No. 12 Overall For Garoppolo
thread.title_full: Michael Holley: The Browns Should Give Up No. 12 Overall For Garoppolo

author: CBS Cleveland
title: Michael Holley: The Browns Should Give Up No. 12 Overall For Garoppolo
text:
Michael Holley: The Browns Should Give Up No. 12 Overall For Garoppolo February 2, 2017 9:08 AM Filed Under: anthony lima , Cleveland Browns , Jimmy Garoppolo , Ken Carman , Michael Holley , New England Patriots CHARLOTTE, NC - AUGUST 26: Jimmy Garoppolo #10 of the New England Patriots throws a pass against the Carolina Panthers in the 3rd quarter during their game at Bank of America Stadium on August 26, 2016 in Charlotte, North Carolina. (Photo by Streeter Lecka/Getty Images) 
Michael Holley, author of Belichick and Brady: Two Men, the Patriots, and How They Revolutionized Football, joined the Ken Carman Show with Anthony Lima to talk about the New England Patriots organization and how the Cleveland Browns might emulate them. The Ken Carman Show With Anthony Lima Follow
